long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Snapshots of HTML5 banners and Rich Media in DALIM ES
This extension for “ES New Media Annotation” enables you to create snapshots for comments, mark-ups or measurements for HTML5, Rich Media and live website proofs in DALIM ES. 
Please note, this plugin only works with the “ES New Media Annotation”-Module and DALIM ES 6 and above.

For more information about DALIM ES and the available modules, check out https://www.dalim.com/en/products/dalim-es/
